body: These cloaks of famed elven design are enhanced to reflect the wearer's surroundings, aiding him in blending in with any terrain. When this plain gray cloak is worn with the hood drawn up around the head, the wearer gains a +5 competence bonus on Stealth checks.
name: Cloak of Elvenkind
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Shoulders/Shoulders Slot Wondrous Items/Cloak of Elvenkind
